file_content.text: Warning--threats or violence will result in immediate suppression.
Once repairs are complete, the warden team will return to prisoner restraint protocols.
Subordinate droids are reporting significant suppression of Esh-kha activity. Programming overrides appear successful.
Getting this place back to normal is the right thing to do.
Just doing my duty.
Can you get the help you need?
Will you be okay?
Affirmative. When conditions are safe, a maintenance droid will respond to assist me. Your concern is... unexpected....
May you succeed in your own primary function.
Next time be more careful.
Affirmative. Warden droids are programmed to be vigilant.
Soon the warden team will return to prisoner restraint protocols instead of suppressing open violence. Your assistance is appreciated.
Use the spikes on reprogrammed warden droids. Override commands will direct them to engage Esh-kha inmates with force.
Subject identified as non-inmate. Threat: negative.
Subjects identified as non-inmates. Threat: negative.
Warden team leader TM-09, requesting Republic assistance. Subordinate droids have been compromised; inmate containment endangered.
I expected more aggression. Care to explain?
Why aren't you hostile?
The other droids in the area attack on sight.
Why aren't you hostile?
The other droids around here are hostile, but not you. Why?
Why aren't you hostile?
I don't get it. All your warden buddies have been trying to blast my head off.
Why aren't you hostile?
Report, droid.
What kind of prison guard lets his whole team be compromised by the inmates?
Not much of a warden, are you?
Hostile inmate numbers were too high.
Esh-kha inmates captured all subordinate droids. They have been reprogrammed to attack non-inmates with lethal force.
This unit can supply emergency security spikes to override Esh-kha reprogramming. Inmate suppression request: Use security spikes to reclaim subordinate droids.
I can win back your droids for you.
Sounds like a plan.
Your droids will join you in suppressing this bloodshed.
Sounds like a plan.
I think I can handle a droid recovery op.
Sounds like a plan.
I'll get your droids back. Hand over the spikes.
Sounds like a plan.
Acknowledged. Prepare for heavy resistance.
With your droids back on our side, things are going to heat up.
Sure, let's cause some chaos.
Affirmative--you are likely to experience heavy inmate resistance.
Reprogrammed droids will be directed to engage inmates until area is pacified.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
Understood. Please send assistance if possible. The Esh-kha in this area must be suppressed.
Systems restarting. Do not approach.
